snippet: Borussia Dortmund twice came back from a goal down to draw 2-2 at Hoffenheim on Friday despite playing for more than one half with 10 men following the dismissal of Marco Reus....
lead_paragraph: Borussia Dortmund twice came back from a goal down to draw 2-2 at Hoffenheim on Friday despite playing for more than one half with 10 men following the dismissal of Marco Reus.

headline.main: Ten-Man Dortmund Rally Twice to Draw at Hoffenheim
headline.print_headline: Ten-Man Dortmund Rally Twice to Draw at Hoffenheim
